diversity.config.baby_nametag.tooltip:
- Nametag contains 'baby' will force baby animals never grow up.
- Not case sensitive or requires any space.
- Example: "Baby", "ThisIsBaby"
diversity.config.banner_trohpy.tooltip: - Add some Ominous banner-like banners as trophy. Obtains via boss drops, etc.
diversity.config.beacon_extended.tooltip:
- Extends the beacon's range and duration beyond level 4!
- Each layer past level 4 adds 20 blocks in range, up to level 10.
diversity.config.bigger_radius_bookshelf: - Enchanting table can accept bookshelves placed two blocks away.
diversity.config.blacklist_day_counter.t: - Block day counter message from day counter module in client-side.
diversity.config.bonemeal_coral_fan.tool: - Coral fan/block can be bonemeal to grow into corals (Warm ocean only)
diversity.config.bonemeal_small_flower.t: - Small flowers can be bonemeal to spread itself on Mycelium.
diversity.config.brushable_parrot_chicke:
- Brushing parrot or chicken will drop feathers.
- Chicken has lower cooldown.
diversity.config.bundle_enchantment.tool: - Add 2 enchantment for bundle (refill and capacity).
diversity.config.bundle_place_mode.toolt:
- Switch to place mode by holding bundle and shift-leftclick to the ground.
- Then you can place block that inside the bundle.
diversity.config.cancel.tooltip: Exit Config Screen without saving any changes.
diversity.config.check_villager_schedule: - Check villager work schedule by holding Clock in hand and right-click any type of workstation block
diversity.config.chicken_egg_despawn_try: - Chicken eggs on ground will try to hatch before it despawned.
diversity.config.click_through_itemframe:
- Allows right-clicking through signs and item frames (holding item) if they are placed on chests, barrels, or shulker boxes (container blocks).
- Behave exactly like normally open container.
- Shift to rotate item/edit sign.
diversity.config.clock_shows_time.toolti: - Use Clock to show current time.
- Make copper bulb block delay 1 tick like in the snapshot.
diversity.config.day_counter.tooltip: - Day counter for each day passed.
diversity.config.day_counter_speed.toolt:
- Change the delay between each letter when printing the message.
 - Smaller value, faster the message.
- Only change if you know what you are doing.
diversity.config.day_counter_tick_per_da:
- Change daytime total tick.
- Only change if you know what you are doing.
diversity.config.deepslate_generator.too: - Deepslate will replace stone and cobble stone if lava x water below y-level 8.
diversity.config.default.tooltip: Reset this field to it's default value.
diversity.config.easy_shulker_box_compat:
- EasyShulkerBoxes compatibility layer for bundles.
- Allow capacity enchantment to work with this mod.
diversity.config.emote.tooltip: - Perform sound like meow, purr, purroew, and woof if chat or via /emote command.
diversity.config.enchancement_compat.too:
- Enchancement compatibility layer for bundles modules.
- Allow bundle enchantments to work with this mod.
diversity.config.explosive_sniffer.toolt:
- Right-click powder (gun powder, blaze powder, sugar, redstone, glowstone dust) to Sniffer will make it sniffs and...
"To teach kids never to sniff something unknown."
- Faewulf
diversity.config.faster_minecart.tooltip: - Rail placed on `Gravel` will make Minecart and its variants travel faster.
diversity.config.faster_oxidization.tool: - Copper block and its variations oxidize faster in rain and water.
diversity.config.fox_auto_breed.tooltip: - Fox enters breed mode after eat berries.
diversity.config.fox_bury_items.tooltip:
- Fox can bury items in sand or gravel.
- If not holding any item in mouth, it will bury random items.
diversity.config.glow_berry_glowing.tool: - Eat glow berry will give you glow effect.
diversity.config.hoe_harvest_crop.toolti:
- Mature crops now can be harvest and auto replant with right-click.
- Use hoe will give 3x3 harvest radius.
- Diamond and Netherite hoe gives 5x5 radius.
- Horses, donkeys, mules, camel can fit in boats!
diversity.config.hydrophobic_elytra.tool: - Elytra can't be use in rain, or in water.
diversity.config.invisible_frame.tooltip:
- Make item frames invisible by sneak + right-clicking a non-dyed glass pane into them.
- They stay invisible when holding an item, otherwise, they emit particles as indicators.
diversity.config.mace_rotate_block.toolt: - Use mace (sneaking + right-click) to rotate directional blocks if possible.
diversity.config.more_enchantment.toolti:
- Add weaker versions of the four protection enchantments.
- These provide extra protection with effects identical to the originals but at only 25% of their original power.
diversity.config.mud_sugarcane.tooltip: - Sugarcane doesn't need nearby water when planted on mud, as mud already contains water.
diversity.config.no_level_limit_anvil.to:
- Removes the "Too Expensive" limitation from anvils.
In Client side will still displays the "Too expensive" label if mod installed server-side only, but still functional.
diversity.config.permission_enable.toolt: - Enable this if you want to use permission mode for commands.
diversity.config.pet_patting.tooltip:
- Interact with your pets via shift + right-click to pat them.
- Wolf, Cat, Horse, Parrot)
diversity.config.piglin_goldenTrimmedArm: - Piglin treats golden trimmed armor as golden armor.
diversity.config.prevent_farmland_trampl: - Farmland is not trampled if the entity (including players) is wearing Feather Falling boots or has the Slow Falling effect.
diversity.config.prevent_setSpawn_onSlee: - Sneak and right-click a bed to sleep without changing your respawn point.
diversity.config.prevent_tamed_horse_wan: - Mobs wearing saddle won't wander around.
diversity.config.rabbit_eat_carrot_crops: - Rabbit can breed after eat carrot crops.
diversity.config.random_size_fishes.tool: - Fish and squid now come in random sizes.
diversity.config.require_restart: âš  This feature requires restarting the game to apply the changes.
diversity.config.reset.tooltip: Reset all options to their default, can be undo.
diversity.config.reverse_phantom.tooltip: - Phantom will spawn if player continuously sleep skipping the night.
diversity.config.shear_can_pickpocket_vi:
- Pickpocket villager using Shear while sneaking.
- Pickpocket from the front has a high chance of making them angry; reduce it by pickpocketing from behind, or completely nullify it with invisibility potion.
- Pickpocketing has a chance to reset their profession. The higher the profession level, the lower the chance of it resetting.
diversity.config.shear_defuses_tnt.toolt: - Shears can be used on primed TNT to give a chance to defuse it.
diversity.config.shear_prevent_growing.t: - Shear can be used on Saplings, Bamboo, Vine and Sugar cane to prevent it from growing
diversity.config.shulker_label.tooltip:
- Shulker box will shows its custom name upon placed.
- Sneaking while place will prevent this feature.
diversity.config.silent_nametag.tooltip:
- Nametag contains 'silent' or 'shutup' will make mobs silent
- Not case sensitive or requires any space.
diversity.config.sleep_dont_skip_weather:
- Sleeping doesn't clear weather.
- RAIN_ONLY will keep rain only.
- ALL_WEATHER will keep rain and thunder (this mode will prevent you from sleeping while thundering)
diversity.config.slime_chunk_check.toolt:
- Holding 'Slime Ball`, 'Slime Block', or items with the 'diversity:slime_detector' tag will emit particles and sound when in a slime chunk.
- With a 10% chance while walking/running and 70% chance when sneaking.
diversity.config.smaller_bee.tooltip: - Bees are now half their default size.
diversity.config.sniffer_get_spore.toolt: - Sniffer will drops Spores blossom and Small dripleaf when sniffed on moss blocks.
diversity.config.snow_golem_produces_pow: - Snow Golem stands inside a Cauldron will produce Powder snow over time.
diversity.config.softer_sweetBery.toolti:
- Sneaking through sweet berry bushes.
- Wearing pants protects you from sweet berry bush damage.
diversity.config.spyglass_what_is_that.t:
- See additional block/entity information with a Spyglass, default radius is 5 blocks.
- Zoom with Spyglass will extend to 32 blocks.
diversity.config.spyglass_what_is_that_n: - Max inspect range in normal mode.
- Should shows block's direction in normal mode?
- Should shows block's name in normal mode?
- Should shows distance information in normal mode?
- Should shows block's extra information in normal mode?
diversity.config.spyglass_what_is_that_z: - Max inspect range in zoom mode.
- Should shows block's direction in zoom mode?
- Should shows block's name in zoom mode?
- Should shows distance information in zoom mode?
- Should shows block's extra information in zoom mode?
diversity.config.title: Diversity's Configs
diversity.config.torch_burn_target.toolt: - If any entity attack while holding a torch, soul torch; target will be set on fire.
diversity.config.trident_call_thunder.to:
- If standing at max y-level and throw a channeling trident (with >50% durability) up to the sky
Thunder storm will be summoned.
- In return, trident will lose channeling and all of durability (will not break).
diversity.config.undo.tooltip: Revert all options to their pre-edit state.
diversity.config.usable_suspicious_block: - You can add items (by shift right-click) into empty suspicious sand and gravel.
diversity.config.wandering_trader_announ: - Announce in chat when wandering trader appears.
- Waxed copper blocks will emit particles if holding a spyglass while sneaking.
diversity.config.wet_sponge_dry_in_warm_: - Wet sponge placed in warm biome will eventually dried out.
- Wet sponge placed in warm biome will eventually dry out.
enchantment.diversity.backup_blast_prote: Reduces a small amount of the damage from explosions and explosion knockback.
enchantment.diversity.backup_fire_protec: Slightly reduces the effects of fire damage. Also reduces the burn time when set on fire.
enchantment.diversity.backup_projectile_: Reduces a small amount of the damage from projectiles such as arrows and fire balls.
Reduces a small amount of the damage from most sources.
enchantment.diversity.refill.desc: Grants the bundle the ability to automatically refill items from the user's inventory when they run out while placing.
enchantment.diversity.selective_vacuum.d: Bundle automatically sucks newly picked-up items, but only those already inside.
enchantment.diversity.vacuum.desc: Bundle automatically sucks newly picked-up items.
